resolution.translation[0].definitions[0]: a formal decision or statement agreed on by a group of people, especially after a vote
a resolution calling for a ban on dumping nuclear waste
They have failed to comply with the resolution.
The resolution was passed by a two-thirds majority.
resolution.translation[0].definitions[1]: when someone solves a problem, argument, or difficult situation
a forum for the resolution of commercial disputes
resolution.translation[0].definitions[2]: a promise to yourself to do something
New Year’s resolution (=a resolution made on January 1st)
Carol made a resolution to work harder at school.
resolution.translation[0].definitions[3]: Then, with sudden resolution, she stood up.
resolution.translation[0].definitions[4]: the power of a television, camera, microscope etc to give a clear picture
high/low resolution (=how clear or unclear the picture is)
resolution.translation[0].note_box[0].se: The Security Council passed a resolution condemning the country’s aggression.
The resolution was adopted by 12 votes to none.
The National Assembly rejected the resolution.
The resolution was proposed by the chairman of the committee.
Siddall tabled a resolution asking for the Board’s approval of the Five Year Business Plan.
Are there any comments you wish to make before we vote on this resolution?
We support the EU resolution calling for a ban on the use of these fishing nets.
The UN Security Council tabled a resolution condemning the invasion.
resolution.translation[1].definitions[0]: an official decision or statement agreed on by two or more people or groups of people, often after a vote
ashareholder resolution calling for a review of the company’s policy
The resolution was passed by a two-thirds majority.
resolution.translation[1].definitions[1]: when a particular dispute, legal case etc is settled
The company wants aspeedy resolution of the matter to limit its losses.
resolution.translation[1].definitions[2]: a measurement of the number of PIXELs a computer screen can show. The measurement, called DPI, is the number of dots over an inch of the screen. Screens with high resolution (=lots of dots) are clearer than those with low resolution
You can use the display setting to increase the resolution of the screen.
